document_data.name: Verrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Verrin''' was a thug in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], who worked for [[Marlin Stormserpent]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Verrin was an accomplice in many of Marlin Stormserpent's dirty deeds.
document_data.History:
In [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the treasonous nobleman Marlin Stormserpent stole the ''[[Wyverntongue Chalice]]'' from [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Suzail]]. He used an exit passage leading into the basements beneath [[the Old Dwarf]], a nearby tavern, where the gate was to be unlocked by his accomplice, Verrin. However, he found Verrin was working with [[Marlazander]] and had left the gate locked.

Marlin then unleashed his [[stirge]], [[Thirsty]], which quickly stabbed Verrin in the neck, leaving a mortal wound. Marlazander, in turn, fled, only to be slain by an undead warrior, [[Targrael]].
